title: I have pixel 3 XL and iv connected my synth to use as midi controller , how do I send signal back
content: It's working,and when I press a key on synth it plays the sound through ma phone .but because it's one input on ma phone and it's been used by the synth I need the sound to go back through to my synth so instead of it playing the sound through phone speaker it will come through my synth headphones... So is it down to the phone or the app?
